oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Praise in the Mountains (yellow)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Dixie Echoes (Musical group); Metal photoplates;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (black and yellow on white) announcing Praise in the Mountains featuring Gerald Wolfe and Greater Vision, Jim Cole, Kirk Talley, Karen Peck, and New River at Brevard Music Center on May 28, The Hayes Family, Dixie Echoes, the Wilburns, and Jim Cole at Brevard Music Center on May 29, and the Stamps, Palmetto State Quartet, Tony Gore, and Majesty at the Brevard Music Center on May 30. Poster features a metal photoplate of a violin.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Mike Frederick;
